title: FAME
description: I tamed and modernized an unweildy Wordpress site to set my clients up for success as their platform and userbase continue to grow.

title: TheraQin Movement Clinic
description: When this small business's website was flying under the radar, I did an SEO overhaul to get this clinic the attention it deserves.

title: Surrey Cats
description: This nonprofit was struggling to keep up with applicants until I wrote an automation program to make sure they can keep offering help where it's needed.

title: ClothesLine
description: I built this application for fun as a way to promote sustainable fashion practices. Built with React, Node.js, MySQL, and Express.
